H3.text: who sings it 's my party and i cry if i want to. Lesley Gore

A4.text: Lesley Gore recorded her first hit song 'It's My Party', a US number one in 1963.

A5.text: Lesley Gore's version of 'It's My Party' was certified as a Gold record.
